craftingTechniques.name: Wood Carving
craftingTechniques.description: Traditional hand carving techniques that bring out the natural beauty of premium hardwoods.

craftingTechniques.name: Metal Engraving
craftingTechniques.description: Precision engraving on brass, copper, and other metals for lasting personalization.

craftingTechniques.name: Textile Artistry
craftingTechniques.description: Hand embroidery and fabric work using traditional techniques passed down through generations.

craftingTechniques.name: Glass Etching
craftingTechniques.description: Delicate etching and sandblasting to create intricate designs on premium glassware.

artisans.name: Rajesh Kumar
artisans.bio: Rajesh brings traditional woodworking techniques to create heirloom-quality pieces that stand the test of time.

artisans.name: Priya Sharma
artisans.bio: Priya's metal engravings combine precision with artistic flair, creating personalized pieces with intricate detail.

artisans.name: Vikram Singh
artisans.bio: Vikram oversees our design process, ensuring each piece balances traditional craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics.
